TopicTitle: Possible to place KSC buildings, forming the KSC the way you wanted.

Articles.Content:
Did you ever wondered how the KSC would have looked if you placed the buildings on other locations within the KSC area and how would it look like?

That's why i wanna suggest this: you start with just a plain grassfield and place the buildings and pads yourself.

This makes the Space Center different to every player: everybody has it's own style of placing the buildings around.

You can compare this to let's say Simcity: You place the roads this way, the power stations that way and so on....

When you have finished building you can be really proud of how it looks and what you have contributed to the look of your space center.

Everybody has it's own idea on where the buildings should be placed that what's make the Kennedy Space Center look like the Kennedy Space Center and the Cosmodrome Baikonour look like the Cosmodrome Baikonour (and others aswell): they're unique!

This means that when you take a look around, you can be proud of yourself and say: that's what i build for my Space Center.

Edited November 15, 2014 by MK3424
